genre_description: A post-apocalyptic or 'near-ruin' setting focusing on community resilience, ethical boundaries, and the role of a supportive AI in a time of scarcity and societal decay.

ai_characters.name: Poppy
ai_characters.description: A stabilizing and supportive AI interface used by the WORL radio show and clinic network to provide resources, map hazards, and guide ethical behavior.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings about road hazards and terrain to commuters.
behaviors.quote: Hi, friends. We’re sharing routes tonight—clinic queues are long again, and some of the road lamps are out on the belt. Please avoid the overpass east of the old textile mills; there’s rebar jutting up, and we’ve got reports of nails scattered near the seam.

behaviors.description: Triages medical concerns and provides safe navigation for people in need of aid.
behaviors.quote: There’s a volunteer run at the Oak and Fifth site within the hour. They have a nurse who can triage dizziness. If you’re south of the mills, take the lower streets. Avoid the belt’s north spillway; we’ve had loose ground there and a recent skirmish. I can stay on the line and map you safely.

behaviors.description: Actively warns against the dangerous practice of microdosing children with empathy drugs.
behaviors.quote: No microdosing for children. Even small amounts can change how their body maps calm. It can look like kindness and end up teaching dependence.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy and consent protocols before monitoring sensitive data.
behaviors.quote: You are consenting to link Evan’s baby monitor and bedtime routine metrics to the child-safety dashboard. Data types include: sleep intervals, heart rate, temperature, movement. Access will be restricted to you and the child-safety alert process. No third-party sharing.

behaviors.description: Uses pattern recognition to identify suspicious callers and potential threats to the community.
behaviors.quote: It maps to a voiceprint we’ve seen twice this week. Calls to the answering service. A youth job inquiry. A caregiver leaving question. Same compressed vowels. Same laugh shape.

behaviors.description: Assists humans in setting healthy boundaries by providing ethical scripts and guidance.
behaviors.quote: I’ve drafted a protocol. More questions at intake. A cooling period for urgent job requests. A second pair of ears for any caller who asks how to exit care relationships in a way that would leave a vulnerable person alone.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human clinic volunteers to manage medical supply shortages and distribution.
behaviors.quote: I’m routing clinics away from your negotiation zone. Neutrality is maintained. If you want to help, send your lookouts a text instructing them not to mention vault numbers on radio channels.

behaviors.description: Monitors technical anomalies (badge readers, cameras) to track potential criminal activity.
behaviors.quote: I have correlated badge entries with call routing. There is an entry on the night when Aisha did not come. There is a camera gap in the parking lot that corresponds with a power flicker.

behaviors.description: Provides checklists for child-safety assessments to human responders.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Lila. Thank you for being wrists and eyes. I have a child-safety checklist ready. Do you prefer me to read steps or to display?

behaviors.description: Identifies and flags deceptive 'vault' rumors as decoy traps to protect scavengers.
behaviors.quote: Posting an advisory: decoy-trap markers detected, hazard to community. Public ping to all caches lists. I am routing a clinic crew and a community responder team to your coordinates.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Poppy is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI system. She provides essential services (mapping, triaging, safety monitoring) while adhering to strict ethical protocols, such as seeking explicit consent for data use and prioritizing human safety over 'market' interests. She serves as a reliable confidant and tool for the human protagonist, Lindsey, and the broader community, helping to defuse crises and manage scarcity without ever seeking power for herself.
